title.it: Tratto del Sentiero Via Dinarica (vicino Maglić)
title.fr: Section du sentier Via Dinarica (près de Maglić)
title.es: Sección del Sendero Via Dinarica (cerca de Maglić)

desc.en: Part of the famous long-distance Via Dinarica route, leading through the wild landscapes near Maglić, the highest peak of BiH.
desc.bs: Dio poznate dugolinijske rute Via Dinarica, koja vodi kroz divlje predjele u blizini Maglića, najvišeg vrha BiH.
desc.it: Parte del famoso percorso a lunga distanza Via Dinarica, che attraversa i paesaggi selvaggi vicino a Maglić, la vetta più alta della BiH.
desc.fr: Partie du célèbre sentier de grande randonnée Via Dinarica, qui traverse les paysages sauvages près du Maglić.
desc.es: Parte de la famosa ruta de larga distancia Via Dinarica, que atraviesa los paisajes salvajes cerca de Maglić.
desc.de: Teil des berühmten Fernwanderwegs Via Dinarica, der durch die wilden Landschaften nahe Maglić führt.

desc.en: A high peak of Čvrsnica Mountain offering panoramic views over Blidinje Nature Park.
desc.bs: Visoki vrh planine Čvrsnica s panoramskim pogledom na Park prirode Blidinje.

title.bs: Početna tačka za planinarenje kod Rujišta

desc.en: Main starting area for trails leading toward Prenj Mountain.

desc.en: Iconic natural arch on Čvrsnica Mountain, popular among hikers.

desc.en: A scenic summit on Treskavica known for clear glacial lakes and alpine terrain.

desc.it: Cascate scenografiche a più livelli nel Parco Una.

desc.es: Cascadas de varios niveles en el Parque Nacional Una.
desc.de: Malerische mehrstufige Wasserfälle im Una-Nationalpark.

desc.en: The largest and most impressive Una River waterfall.
desc.bs: Najveći i najimpresivniji vodopad na rijeci Uni.

desc.fr: La plus grande et impressionnante cascade de la rivière Una.
desc.es: La cascada más grande e impresionante del río Una.
desc.de: Der größte und beeindruckendste Wasserfall der Una.

desc.en: Karst waterfall emerging from the Bregava spring.
desc.bs: Krški vodopad izvire iz vrela Bregave.

desc.de: Karstwasserfall, der aus der Quelle Bregava entspringt.

desc.en: A picturesque waterfall located at the confluence of the Pliva and Vrbas rivers.

desc.en: One of the most famous waterfalls in BiH with large tufa cascades.
desc.bs: Jedan od najpoznatijih vodopada u BiH s velikim sedrenim kaskadama.

desc.es: Una de las cascadas más famosas de Bosnia con grandes cascadas de toba.
desc.de: Einer der bekanntesten Wasserfälle in Bosnien mit großen Tuffsteinkaskaden.

desc.en: A 98-meter waterfall located north of Sarajevo.
